E=C.testStyles=c;Modernizr.addTest("touchevents",function(){var t;if("ontouchstart"in e||e.DocumentTouch&&n instanceof DocumentTouch)t=!0;else{var r=["@media Webkit",P=C._config.usePrefixes?z.toLowerCase().split(" "):[];C._domPrefixes=P;var j=C._config.usePrefixes?z.split(" "):[];C._cssomPrefixes=j;var N=function(n){var r,o=x.length,i=e.CSSRule;if("undefined"==typeof i)return t;if(!n)return!1;if(n=n.replace(/^@/,""),r=n.replace(/-/g,"_").toUpperCase()+"_RULE",r in i)return"@"+n;for(var s=0;o>s;s++){var a=x[s],u=a.toUpperCase()+"_"+r;if(u in i)return"@-"+a.toLowerCase()+"-"+n}return!1};C.atRule=N;var A=function(){function e(e,n){var o;return e?(n&&"string"!=typeof n||(n=f(n||"div")),e="on"+e,o=e in n,!o&&r&&(n.setAttribute||(n=f("div")),n.setAttribute(e,""),o="function"==typeof n[e],n[e]!==t&&(n[e]=t),n.removeAttribute(e)),o):!1}var r=!("onblur"in n.documentElement);return e}();C.hasEvent=A,Modernizr.addTest("pointerevents",function(){var e=!1,n=P.length;for(e=Modernizr.hasEvent("pointerdown");n--&&!e;)A(P[n]+"pointerdown")&&(e=!0);return e});var L={elem:f("modernizr")};Modernizr._q.push(function(){delete L.elem});var O={style:L.elem.style};Modernizr._q.unshift(function(){delete O.style}),C.testAllProps=g;var k=C.prefixed=function(e,n,t){return 0===e.indexOf("@")?N(e):(-1!=e.indexOf("-")&&(e=a(e)),n?g(e,n,t):g(e,"pfx"))};C.prefixedCSS=function(e){var n=k(e);return n&&u(n)};o(),i(y),delete C.addTest,delete C.addAsyncTest;for(var q=0;q<Modernizr._q.length;q++)Modernizr._q[q]();e.Modernizr=Modernizr}(window,document);
!function(e){var n=navigator.userAgent,i=/Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/gi;e&&e.addTest&&(e.addTest("mobile",function(){return i.test(n)&&e.mq("only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)")}),e.addTest("tablet",function(){return i.test(n)&&!e.mobile}))}(Modernizr);
  </script>
 </head>
 <body class="locale-en no-tab homepage">
  <header class="marquee bg-image cover-story-marquee only-marquee title-over-light">
   <a class="marquee-link" data-ga-call-to-action="media" data-ga-media-type="image" data-ga-ux-element="Spotlight" href="/runners-stories/a35855243/leland-yu-run-for-chinatown/">

       </path>
      </svg>
     </a>

           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="march in seattle calls for end to asian hate crimes" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/demonstrators-gather-in-the-chinatown-international-news-photo-1616196026.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0816xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="March In Seattle Calls for End To Asian Hate Crimes"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Trending" data-vars-position="3" href="/runners-stories/a35881359/solidarity-runs-aapi-community/">
            Run In Solidarity With the AAPI Community
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item stay-safe-on-the-treadmill image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Trending" data-vars-position="4" href="/gear/a20802637/stay-safe-on-the-treadmill/">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Trending" data-vars-position="4" href="/gear/a20802637/stay-safe-on-the-treadmill/">

        <div class="custom-item what-really-determines-your-vo2-max image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Runner’s World+" data-vars-position="1" href="/training/a20857778/what-really-determines-your-vo2-max/">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Runner’s World+" data-vars-position="1" href="/training/a20857778/what-really-determines-your-vo2-max/">
            What Really Determines Your VO2 Max?
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

        <div class="custom-item how-can-i-banish-that-pain-in-my-butt image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Runner’s World+" data-vars-position="2" href="/health-injuries/a20855795/how-can-i-banish-that-pain-in-my-butt/">
           <img alt="butt pain" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pain-butt-1607374736.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.235xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pain-butt-1607374736.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.235xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pain-butt-1607374736.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.235xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pain-butt-1607374736.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.235xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pain-butt-1607374736.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.235xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Runner’s World+" data-vars-position="2" href="/health-injuries/a20855795/how-can-i-banish-that-pain-in-my-butt/">
            How to Get Rid of That Nagging Pain in Your Butt
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
             By
             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Emily Abbate
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item how-quickly-do-you-lose-fitness-when-you-stop-running image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Runner’s World+" data-vars-position="3" href="/training/a20865027/how-quickly-do-you-lose-fitness-when-you-stop-running/">

    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-stacked">
     <div class="feed-block feed-block-default feed-block-4-across" data-block-template="default">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Dial in Your Runs
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="3c12e995-f4ce-4015-9dd2-3b75a4748ec9" data-vars-block-slot="8" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item what-to-wear image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Dial in Your Runs" data-vars-position="1" href="/training/a20803133/what-to-wear/">

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/runnersworld/assets/css/homepage.e690256.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/runnersworld/assets/css/homepage-mobile.b549721.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
